revised_title: Experimental Researches in Magneto-Electricity and Terrestrial Induction
tldr: Faraday investigates the evolution of electricity by induction from the magnetism of the earth and demonstrates the influence of terrestrial magnetism in eliciting electricity from revolving metallic bodies. He also explores the potential for using this phenomenon in the construction of new electrical machines and discusses the relationship between magneto-electric induction and the Aurora Borealis.
